019package org.jgrapes.osgi.webconlet.bundles;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.time.Instant;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.Dictionary;
030import java.util.Enumeration;
031import java.util.HashMap;
032import java.util.HashSet;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.Locale;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.Set;
038import java.util.TreeMap;
039import java.util.logging.Level;
040import java.util.logging.Logger;
041import java.util.stream.Collectors;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
043import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
044import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
045import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
046import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
059import org.osgi.framework.Bundle;
060import org.osgi.framework.BundleContext;
061import org.osgi.framework.BundleEvent;
062import org.osgi.framework.BundleException;
063import org.osgi.framework.BundleListener;
064import org.osgi.framework.startlevel.BundleStartLevel;
065import org.osgi.framework.wiring.BundleRevision;
066
067/**
068 * 
069 */
070public class BundleListConlet
071        extends FreeMarkerConlet<BundleListConlet.BundleListModel>
072        implements BundleListener {
073
074    private static final Logger LOG
075        = Logger.getLogger(BundleListConlet.class.getName());
076
077    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
078        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.View);
079    private final BundleContext context;
080
081    /**
082     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
083     * 
084     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
085     *            on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
086     *            sends the event to
087     */
088    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UnusedFormalParameter")
089    public BundleListConlet(Channel componentChannel, BundleContext context,
090            Map<?, ?> properties) {
091        super(componentChannel);
092        this.context = context;
093        context.addBundleListener(this);
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
098     *
099     * @param event the event
100     * @param channel the channel
101     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
102     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
103     *             exception
104     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
105     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
106     */
107    @Handler
108    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleSession channel)
109            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
110            ParseException, IOException {
111        // Add conlet resources to page
112        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
113            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview).setDisplayNames(
114                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
115            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
116                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
117                    type(), "Bundles-functions.ftl.js"))
118                .setScriptType("module"))
119            .addCss(event.renderSupport(),
120                WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath("Bundles-style.css")));
121    }
122
123    @Override
124    protected Optional<BundleListModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
125            ConsoleSession session, String conletId) throws Exception {
126        BundleListModel conletModel = new BundleListModel(conletId);
127        return Optional.of(conletModel);
128    }
129
130    @Override
131    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
132            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId,
133            BundleListModel conletModel) throws Exception {
134        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
135        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
136            Template tpl
137                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("Bundles-preview.ftl.html");
138            channel.respond(new RenderConletFromTemplate(event, type(),
139                conletId, tpl, fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletModel))
140                    .setRenderAs(
141                        RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
142                    .setSupportedModes(MODES));
143            List<Map<String, Object>> bundleInfos
144                = Arrays.stream(context.getBundles())
145                    .map(bndl -> createBundleInfo(bndl, channel.locale()))
146                    .collect(Collectors.toList());
147            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
148                conletId, "bundleUpdates", bundleInfos, "preview", true));
149            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
150        }
151        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
152            Template tpl
153                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("Bundles-view.ftl.html");
154            channel.respond(new RenderConletFromTemplate(event,
155                type(), conletId, tpl,
156                fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletModel))
157                    .setRenderAs(
158                        RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs())));
159            List<Map<String, Object>> bundleInfos
160                = Arrays.stream(context.getBundles())
161                    .map(bndl -> createBundleInfo(bndl, channel.locale()))
162                    .collect(Collectors.toList());
163            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
164                conletId, "bundleUpdates", bundleInfos, "view", true));
165            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
166        }
167        return renderedAs;
168    }
169
170    private Map<String, Object> createBundleInfo(Bundle bundle, Locale locale) {
171        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
172        Map<String, Object> result = new HashMap<>();
173        result.put("id", bundle.getBundleId());
174        result.put("name",
175            Optional.ofNullable(bundle.getHeaders(locale.toString())
176                .get("Bundle-Name")).orElse(bundle.getSymbolicName()));
177        result.put("symbolicName", bundle.getSymbolicName());
178        result.put("version", bundle.getVersion().toString());
179        result.put("category",
180            Optional.ofNullable(bundle.getHeaders(locale.toString())
181                .get("Bundle-Category")).orElse(""));
182        result.put("state", "bundleState_" + bundle.getState());
183        result.put("startable", false);
184        result.put("stoppable", false);
185        if ((bundle.getState()
186            & (Bundle.RESOLVED | Bundle.INSTALLED | Bundle.ACTIVE)) != 0) {
187            boolean isFragment = (bundle.adapt(BundleRevision.class).getTypes()
188                & BundleRevision.TYPE_FRAGMENT) != 0;
189            result.put("startable", !isFragment
190                && (bundle.getState() == Bundle.INSTALLED
191                    || bundle.getState() == Bundle.RESOLVED));
192            result.put("stoppable",
193                !isFragment && bundle.getState() == Bundle.ACTIVE);
194        }
195        result.put("uninstallable", (bundle.getState()
196            & (Bundle.INSTALLED | Bundle.RESOLVED | Bundle.ACTIVE)) != 0);
197        result.put("uninstalled", bundle.getState() == Bundle.UNINSTALLED);
198        return result;
199    }
200
201    @Override
202    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
203            ConsoleSession channel, BundleListModel conletState)
204            throws Exception {
205        event.stop();
206        Bundle bundle = context.getBundle(event.params().asInt(0));
207        if (bundle == null) {
208            return;
209        }
210        try {
211            switch (event.method()) {
212            case "stop":
213                bundle.stop();
214                break;
215            case "start":
216                bundle.start();
217                break;
218            case "refresh":
219                break;
220            case "update":
221                bundle.update();
222                break;
223            case "uninstall":
224                bundle.uninstall();
225                break;
226            case "sendDetails":
227                sendBundleDetails(event.conletId(), channel, bundle);
228                break;
229            default:// ignore
230                break;
231            }
232        } catch (BundleException e) {
233            // ignore
234            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Cannot update bundle state", e);
235        }
236    }
237
238    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
239    private void sendBundleDetails(String conletId, ConsoleSession channel,
240            Bundle bundle) {
241        Locale locale = channel.locale();
242        List<Object> data = new ArrayList<>();
243        data.add(
244            new Object[] { "bundleSymbolicName", bundle.getSymbolicName() });
245        data.add(
246            new Object[] { "bundleVersion", bundle.getVersion().toString() });
247        data.add(new Object[] { "bundleLocation",
248            bundle.getLocation().replace(".", ".&#x200b;") });
249        data.add(new Object[] { "bundleLastModification",
250            Instant.ofEpochMilli(bundle.getLastModified()).toString(),
251            "dateTime" });
252        data.add(new Object[] { "bundleStartLevel",
253            bundle.adapt(BundleStartLevel.class).getStartLevel() });
254        Dictionary<String, String> dict = bundle.getHeaders(locale.toString());
255        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
256        Map<String, String> headers = new TreeMap<>();
257        for (Enumeration<String> e = dict.keys(); e.hasMoreElements();) {
258            String key = e.nextElement();
259            headers.put(key, dict.get(key));
260        }
261        List<Object> headerList = new ArrayList<>();
262        for (Map.Entry<String, String> e : headers.entrySet()) {
263            headerList.add(new Object[] { e.getKey(),
264                e.getKey().contains("Package")
265                    ? e.getValue().replace(".", ".&#x200b;")
266                    : e.getValue() });
267        }
268        data.add(new Object[] { "manifestHeaders", headerList, "table" });
269        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
270            conletId, "bundleDetails", bundle.getBundleId(), data));
271    }
272
273    /**
274     * Translates the OSGi {@link BundleEvent} to a JGrapes event and fires it
275     * on all known console session channels.
276     *
277     * @param event the event
278     */
279    @Override
280    public void bundleChanged(BundleEvent event) {
281        fire(new BundleChanged(event), trackedSessions());
282    }
283
284    /**
285     * Handles a {@link BundleChanged} event by updating the information in the
286     * console sessions.
287     *
288     * @param event the event
289     */
290    @Handler
291    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
292    public void onBundleChanged(BundleChanged event,
293            ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
294        for (String conletId : conletIds(consoleSession)) {
295            consoleSession.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(), conletId,
296                "bundleUpdates",
297                (Object) new Object[] { createBundleInfo(
298                    event.bundleEvent().getBundle(), consoleSession.locale()) },
299                "*", false));
300        }
301    }
302
303    @Override
304    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel,
305            String conletId) throws Exception {
306        return true;
307    }
308
309    /**
310     * Wraps an OSGi {@link BundleEvent}.
311     */
312    public static class BundleChanged extends Event<Void> {
313        private final BundleEvent bundleEvent;
314
315        /**
316         * Instantiates a new event.
317         *
318         * @param bundleEvent the OSGi bundle event
319         */
320        public BundleChanged(BundleEvent bundleEvent) {
321            this.bundleEvent = bundleEvent;
322        }
323
324        /**
325         * Return the OSGi bundle event.
326         *
327         * @return the bundle event
328         */
329        public BundleEvent bundleEvent() {
330            return bundleEvent;
331        }
332
333    }
334
335    /**
336     * The bundle's model.
337     */
338    @SuppressWarnings("serial")
339    public class BundleListModel extends ConletBaseModel {
340
341        /**
342         * Instantiates a new bundle list model.
343         *
344         * @param conletId the web console component id
345         */
346        public BundleListModel(String conletId) {
347            super(conletId);
348        }
349
350        /**
351         * Return the bundles.
352         *
353         * @return the bundle[]
354         */
355        public Bundle[] bundles() {
356            return context.getBundles();
357        }
358
359    }
360}
